active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the challenges of detecting decentralized C2 channels using Living Off The Land (LOTL) techniques in the context of the Cyber Kill Chain. Propose 3 innovative countermeasures and evaluate their feasibility against MITRE ATT&CK techniques like T1071.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Plausible misconceptions (e.g., confuse C2 with exfiltration).
Similar concepts (e.g., beaconing vs. lateral movement).
Edge cases (e.g., LOTL mimicking legit traffic).
Overly specific vs. general (ensure 1 correct, 3 tempting wrongs)

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in 'Command and Control (C2) Detection' (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Threat Intelligence And Hunting > Threat Intelligence Platforms > 003_Frameworks and Methodologies > Cyber Kill Chain > C2 Detection). Use the provided Learning Objectives, Active Learning components, Scaffolding Layers (4 progressive layers with full content), and Flashcard Schema to generate high-quality flashcards. Incorporate: - Bloom's progression: Ensure coverage across levels. - Voter priorities: Completeness (full Cyber Kill Chain, techniques like beaconing/DNS/HTTP, sources), pedagogy (action verbs, scaffolding). - Research Context: C2 definitions, LOTL, MITRE ATT&CK, completed Kill Chain integration. Output ONLY in JSON array of flashcards, each matching the Schema: [{ "front": "Question with A/B/C/D options", "back": { "answer": "...", "bloom_level": "...", "scaffolding_layer": 1-4, "rationale": "...", "active_learning_tie_in": "...", "source_reference": "..." } }, ...] Generate 80 flashcards: Distribute by layer/Bloom's as per schema. Use distractor protocol strictly. Make questions active recall-focused for spaced repetition (Anki-compatible). Ensure university-level rigor with real-world applicability.
